message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's a perfect match for you. To make this opportunity even more attractive, I am extending a special offer to you at a price of $11,000. This exclusive deal is available only for a limited time, so I encourage you to respond promptly. Thank you for considering our product, and I look forward to your positive response.
